title: league of legends freezes on me all the time and i think i know why but idk how to fix it, help?
body:
basically every 5-10 mins into the game my league client crashes and i get BSOD and this ONLY happens in league. it just recently started happening too and i believe i know why. when i check to see my league compatibility it says that im running on windows xp service pack 2 which no longer works on league. 

my operating system is windows 7 and i have sevice pack 1 for that. how can i fix league so that it'll run on windows service pack for windows 7? 

ive tried uninstalling but that did not help

replies.body:
Your version of League is running in Windows XP compatibility mode? That's a little odd if it's doing that on it's own, but it should be simple enough to fix. Right click on your League desktop icon and click properties. From there, choose 'Compatibility' and then make sure your options look like this.
